Class PerspectiveProjector

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.engine.spatial.PerspectiveProjector
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpatialProjector
public final class PerspectiveProjector extends Object implements SpatialProjector
Perspective projector: scales by depth (z).
Since:
1.7.0
Version:
1.7.0
Author:
Arber Gashi

    • getCalculatedProjectionBatch

      Description copied from interface: SpatialProjector
      Projects a batch of 3D points packed as xyz triples.
      Specified by:
      getCalculatedProjectionBatch in interface SpatialProjector
      Parameters:
      inputCoords - flat xyz array (x1,y1,z1,x2,y2,z2,...)
      outputCoords - flat xyz array for results
      pointCount - number of points
